review: Really like this little add-on. It works reliably and makes viewing computer videos so easy. Now I want one that projects whatever is on my screen including spreadsheets or word documents!  :)
author: Terrie

review: I absolutely love using this. It is easy to setup and it is very easy to use. I mainly use this to cast Pandora and Netflix onto the TV. I cast Pandora when we have a party or when I am cooking or cleaning. I love being able to watch Netflix on the TV now instead of just the computer of my iPhone. It makes it great for the whole family. Also, I love the backdrop when you are casting nothing because it shows amazing pictures of art works, places to go, current news for the day and you can also have it use your own pictures that you choose. You can pick and choose what you want on your backdrop screen which is a great feature. Sometimes I like to just watch the backdrop screen because I have found things to put on my bucket list and I have also come across amazing works of artwork, where it has inspired me to paint certain object or in certain styles, since I am also an artist.
author: Miller
